feed.title: Ente Auth Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.2.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] Fix ~/.cache being deleted on linux by @gepbird in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4597
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4605
  • Add Custom Icon for PostScan Mail by @NanoBunTV in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4593
  • [auth] Add Newgrounds icon by @clownmedy in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4600
  • [auth] add padding to the generated QR code image to prevent coner eyâ€¦ by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4591
  • Fix Belo icon displaying as a violet square instead of the correct icon by @alanmoyano in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4619
  • [mob][auth] Add certificate fingerprint by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4632
  • [auth] Fix 2fas import by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4663
  • [auth] Bump version & hide import from gallery for external users by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4664
  • [auth][mob] Gracefully handle registration error by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4666
  • [auth] Update flatpak version by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4668

New Contributors

  • @gepbird made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4597
  • @clownmedy made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4600

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v4.2.3...auth-v4.2.4

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.2.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4675
  • [auth] Enable translation for more languages by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4674
  • [auth] Fix app bar Icon spacing by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4681
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4689
  • [Auth] Add Fastmail logo by @jbelien in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4685
  • [auth] Adding 2 new custom icons for AzurHosts, MineNode and AzurWare by @YoannDev90 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4678
  • [auth] Fix privacy screen color for dark mode by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4696
  • [auth] Update auth ios icon by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4698
  • [auth] Use issuerName as default sort key by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4699
  • [auth] fix generic icon not updating when issuer name is changed by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4705
  • [auth] Fix content not scrolling when font size set to large by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4700
  • [auth] Fix logo for Enom by @ludespeedny in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4707
  • [auth] Update version by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4708
  • [auth] Update Github build action by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4709
  • [auth] Update Github build action by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4710
  • [auth] Fix workflow for Ubuntu build by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4711
  • [auth] Fix export with invalid algo name by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4712

New Contributors

  • @jbelien made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4685
  • @YoannDev90 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4678

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v4.2.4...auth-v4.2.7

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.2.8
entry.content:
• [auth] Potential fix for segfault on Linux due to bad window size by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4731
  • [auth] Fix manual code setup by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4738

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v4.2.7...auth-v4.2.8

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Auth] Add Badlion logo by @Bl4ckspell7 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4746
  • [Auth] Add more custom icons by @Bl4ckspell7 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4753
  • [auth][mob] Add padding during SRP authn by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4758
  • [auth] Add Starbreeze icon by @LivioZ in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4743
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4782
  • [auth] Update icons by @jbelien in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4777
  • [auth] Notification banner by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4789
  • [auth] Minor fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4797
  • [mob][auth] Flutter upgrade to 3.27.2 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4799
  • [auth] Remove scan package by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4804
  • [auth] Update crypto dependency + bump version by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4805
  • [auth] Revert Notification banner by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4806
  • [auth] Bump version v4.3.0 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4812
  • [auth] Fix deeplink issue by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4818

New Contributors

  • @LivioZ made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4743

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v4.2.8...auth-v4.3.1

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.3.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] Auth banner widget by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4820
  • [auth] Attempt to fix icons displaying as black by @Bl4ckspell7 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4843
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4861
  • [auth] Hide [Share/QR/Edit/Trash] popup in code reorder screen by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4866
  • [auth] World Cube Association Icon by @Alf3rez in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4853
  • [auth] Create a custom icons for NekoHosting by @VanillaChan6571 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4838
  • [auth] Auth banner by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4842
  • [auth] Use zip compression for windows build by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4868
  • [auth] Add & update icons by @DerBraky in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4844
  • [auth] Downgrade flutter by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4882
  • Remove extra line breaks in Auth app descriptions by @smncd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4883

New Contributors

  • @Alf3rez made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4853
  • @VanillaChan6571 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4838
  • @smncd made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4883

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v4.3.1...auth-v4.3.2
